/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in different hues, adding a vibrant splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the rhythm of city life. Trees dot the sidewalk, providing a touch of nature amidst the concrete structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
